0011000110010110 1000001101011101 1 -> sum: 1011010011110100, cout: 0
0000101001111110 0011011111110110 1 -> sum: 0100001001110101, cout: 0
0100010100000000 1000001001100001 0 -> sum: 1100011101100001, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
